description: Erection of single storey rear and part side extension and front porch to premises
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the northern or southern wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The extensions hereby permitted shall be used only for domestic purposes in connection with the use of the bungalow as a dwellinghouse (C3)

Condition : 7 - Informative:

The applicant is advise that this permission does not imply any consent for the forecourt parking layout shown on the submitted plans and relates to the approved extension only.

Condition : 8 - 1.1	The proposal for the erection of a single-storey side and rear extension incorporating a front porch complies with the Council's Residential Extensions Guidelines for size, design and appearance, and would represent a satisfactory form of development.  As such it is considered that the proposed extensions would not harm the neighbours' living conditions, the character of the house or the area.  Approval is therefore recommended.
